span.span: The namespace contains classes used to read the values found in application configuration files under the [<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md) section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間中的類別會由序列化 (Serialization) 基礎結構用來處理組態項目，無法直接使用。The classes in this namespace are used by the serialization infrastructure to handle the configuration elements and cannot be used directly. 如需組態檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[組態檔結構描述](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md)。For more information about configuration files, see [Configuration File Schema](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/index.md). 相反地，若要設定或、 建立應用程式組態檔，並使用下列 XML 元素：Instead, to configure the or , create an application configuration file and use the following XML elements: - [<system.xml.serialization>項目<system.xml.serialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-xml-serialization-element.md) - [<schemaImporterExtensions>項目<schemaImporterExtensions> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/schemaimporterextensions-element.md) - [<新增>元素<xmlSchemaImporterExtensions><add> Element for <xmlSchemaImporterExtensions>](~/docs/standard/serialization/add-element-for-xmlschemaimporterextensions.md) - [<dateTimeSerialization>項目<dateTimeSerialization> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/datetimeserialization-element.md) - [<xmlSerializer>項目<xmlSerializer> Element](~/docs/standard/serialization/xmlserializer-element.md)
